experiences.title: Drive the Icefields Parkway (Banff ‚Üí Jasper)
experiences.description: One of the most scenic drives in the world. 230km through the Canadian Rockies. Glaciers, turquoise lakes, wildlife.
experiences.why: Once in a lifetime scenic drive. Best done in summer or early fall when roads are clear.
steps: Rent a car with good mileage (long distances)
Book accommodation in Banff (2 nights) and Jasper (2 nights)
Key stops: Lake Louise, Peyto Lake, Columbia Icefield, Athabasca Falls

experiences.title: Learn to make sushi
experiences.description: Take a proper sushi-making class. Learn technique, rice preparation, knife skills.
experiences.why: Sushi is expensive to eat out. Making it yourself is satisfying and impressive for hosting.

experiences.title: Hot air balloon ride
experiences.description: Sunrise hot air balloon ride over Ontario countryside. Champagne breakfast after landing.
experiences.why: Unique perspective, peaceful experience, great for special occasions or bucket list.
experiences.location: Various launch sites within 1-2hr of Toronto

experiences.title: Complete a half marathon
experiences.description: Train for and complete a half marathon. 21.1km race.
experiences.why: Structured fitness goal with a clear milestone. Toronto Waterfront Half is scenic and flat.

experiences.title: Attend a major tech conference
experiences.description: SXSW, CES, WWDC, or similar. Immerse in tech culture and future trends.
experiences.why: Inspiration, networking, seeing what's next in tech before it hits mainstream.
experiences.location: Austin, Las Vegas, San Francisco, etc.

experiences.title: Wilderness camping trip
experiences.description: Backcountry camping in Algonquin or similar. No amenities, just nature.
experiences.why: Disconnect from everything. Test self-sufficiency. See stars without light pollution.
